MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  LL68 and LL69 postcode area of Amlwch and Penysarn, affecting properties in Amlwch, Penysarn and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of on site difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:11PM on 4th December 2020.
